alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, west central Livingston, east central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Denham Springs to near Prairieville. Movement was west southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Public report of pea to half inch hail. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Merrydale, Geismar, Inniswold, Watson, Prairieville, Village St. George, Shenandoah, Gardere, Greenwell Spring, Carville and Brownfields. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 159 and 180. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension
